subject: This week's component news: $31,950 in prizes
body:

=================================================================
2. HELP BUILD TOPCODER'S UML TOOL

Phase 2 of the UML Tool Assembly Competition is now open for registration. This phase of the assembly adds class diagrams, printing, and other functionality to the final Phase 1 application to complete the tool. You can learn more details about exactly what is required by reading the details in the link below.

The UML Tool will be used by TopCoder members, as part of the component competitions, to design and develop software. It will also be used by TopCoder staff to design and review components.

This assembly competition is for the final, assembled tool. This assembly competition focuses on the GUI aspect of the tool, as well as the overall functionality it will offer.

First prize pays $5,000, with second paying $2,500. Learn more: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ProjectDetail&pj=30001790


=================================================================
3. DR STAGE 4 & ROOKIE OF THE YEAR WINNERS

The last few fixes are complete, and the leaderboards for Stage 4 of the 2007 Digital Run are now final. Congratulations to argolite, who won his third Design stage in a row, and to zsudraco, who won his first Development stage. Congratulations also to the 2007 Rookies of the Year, bendlund and BLE!

Learn more: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=Static&d1=digital_run&d2=2007Stage4Winners


=================================================================
4. TELL US WHAT YOU THINK

We're running a survey of member opinions about competing, participating in forum discussions, and more. Tell us what you think: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewSurvey&sid=17260


Good luck!

- The TopCoder Software Team
